data.title: Shushtar Historical Hydraulic System
data.text: The Shushtar Historical Hydraulic System is a complex irrigation system of the island city Shushtar from the Sassanid era It consists of 13 dams bridges canals and structures which work together as a hydraulic system Located in Iran s Khuzestan Province It was registered on UNESCO s list of World Heritage Sites in 2009 and is Iran s 10th cultural heritage site to be registered on the United Nations list This engineering masterpiece is unique both in Iran and in the world The Sassanids whose economy was mainly dependent on agriculture developed extensive irrigation systems in this region
